level.text: The entrance door to each rooming unit shall be provided with a lock.
A key for each rooming unit shall be furnished to each respective roomer.
A duplicate key or keys shall be retained by the proprietor or manager.
The proprietor or manager shall have access to all rooms at all reasonable hours.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: The Housing Regulations of the District of Columbia, 5G DCRR § 4106, Commissioners’ Order 55-1503 (August 11, 1955).
